name: The Room Game (Or: Get In Before the Strom Arrives by Vandalizing Your Home)
name_original: The Room Game (Or: Get In Before the Strom Arrives by Vandalizing Your Home)
description:
You are a school child stranded outside, and the storm is brewing. Can you get in before the storm starts?

A short puzzle game, made by Firri April, Tuisku "Blizzie M" Penttilä and Antti Hartikainen as a School Project.
